notable_quotes: "60 days after they get the DB papers. oy I think you have positioned yourself perfectly. policy not individuals. . china not trump. . . sovereignty not sovereign"
"I guess you will have to figure out how to make the phrase 'he's a scumbag' into words of support for policy. UGH"
"I think , the 'we are all flawed' and trumps personal life, my opinion of it or of him does not detract from the policy which I fully support."
